#Videos with lower resolution (3x lower) for faster processing. !!! special lens confiog file !!!
#Note, FMVs are generated by on the 1080p videos, on a centered ROI with size half the frame, with k = 10.
#-i RunStillPan_1080p.mp4 -c config.cfg -l cam_intrinsics_1080p.txt -m RunStillPan_1080p_k10.txt -r 640x360 -o RunStillPan.avi
#-i windowStillWalkStill_1080p.mp4 -c config.cfg -l cam_intrinsics_1080p.txt -m windowStillWalkStill_1080p_k10.txt -r 640x360 -o windowStillWalkStill.avi
#Videos with original resolution
#-i RunStillPan_4k.h264 -c config.cfg -l cam_intrinsics.txt -m RunStillPan_4k.txt -r 1280x720 -e 1000 -o RunStillPan.avi
#-i windowStillWalkStill_4k.h264 -c config.cfg -l cam_intrinsics.txt -m windowStillWalkStill_4k.txt -r 1280x720 -e 1000 -o windowStillWalkStill.avi
#D:\Hailo\data\HailoCam_MMS

#warping grid is uniform on the output image. It should have square cells of this size.
#The number of cells must be such that the right and bottom cells contain the image border.
#I.e. ponly pas of those cells are within the image
int OUT_CELL_SIZE_PIX = 64;

#length of a circular buffer holding the motion vector history. Must be a power of 2;
int FMV_HISTORY_LEN   = 128;  #frames

#------------ output camera --------------

OUT_CAMERA_TYPE    = 0;  #projection 0: pinhole, 1: fisheye
OUT_CAMERA_FOV   = 100;  #diagonal FOV, degrees; set to -1 if only using dewarping fucntion w/o stabilization

#------------ stabilization --------------

STAB_K_MIN = 0.1

STAB_K_DECR = 0.001
STAB_K_INC_BLKCRN = 0.01
BLKCRN_TO_K_THR = 0.5

BLKCRN_CORRECT_ENB = 1;

float RUNNING_AVG_COEFF = 0.033;  ///(0..1], typically "1 / number-of-frames-to-average". 1 to disable.
float STD_MULTIPLIER = 3.f;       ///acceptable deviation, >0, normally 2.5-3.5. Set to very big value to disable

#------------ debug --------------

int GEN_RESIZE_GRID = 0; #1: generates grid wihch only resizes the input image into the output

# fix center of stabilized video for debug purposes; black corners may appear
DEBUG_FIX_STAB = 0
FIX_STAB_LO = 0
FIX_STAB_LA = 0
